label: AWS S3
description: Store events in an Amazon S3 bucket

config_fields.label: Bucket Name
config_fields.description: The name of your AWS S3 bucket

config_fields.label: AWS Region
config_fields.description: The AWS region where your bucket is located

config_fields.label: Object Key Prefix
config_fields.description: Optional prefix to prepend to object keys

config_fields.label: Object Key Suffix
config_fields.description: Optional suffix to append to object keys

config_fields.label: Include Timestamp in Object Key
config_fields.description: Whether to include a timestamp in the object key after the prefix

config_fields.label: Include Event ID in Object Key
config_fields.description: Whether to include the event ID in the object key after the prefix and timestamp

config_fields.label: S3 Storage Class
config_fields.description: The storage class for the S3 objects (e.g., STANDARD, INTELLIGENT_TIERING, GLACIER, etc.)
